/* DashboardMapper.getEssRunData */ SELECT IF( IFNULL(SUM(IF(V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0), 0)) / ((#{bmsCapa} * ((#{maxSoc} - #{minSoc}) / 100)) * 1 ) * 100, 0) > 100, 100, IFNULL(SUM(IF(V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0), 0)) / ((#{bmsCapa} * ((#{maxSoc} - #{minSoc}) / 100)) * 1 ) * 100, 0) ) AS todayChargeRate , IFNULL(SUM(IF(V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH, 0), 0)) / ((#{bmsCapa} * ((#{maxSoc} - #{minSoc}) / 100)) * 1 ) * 100, 0) AS todayDischargeRate
, IF( IFNULL(SUM(IF(V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -1 day), '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0), 0)) / ((#{bmsCapa} * ((#{maxSoc} - #{minSoc}) / 100)) * 1 ) * 100, 0) > 100, 100, IFNULL(SUM(IF(V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -1 day), '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0), 0)) / ((#{bmsCapa} * ((#{maxSoc} - #{minSoc}) / 100)) * 1 ) * 100, 0) ) AS yesterdayChargeRate , IFNULL(SUM(IF(V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -1 day), '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH, 0), 0)) / ((#{bmsCapa} * ((#{maxSoc} - #{minSoc}) / 100)) * 1 ) * 100, 0) AS yesterdayDischargeRate FROM NRT_PCS_DAILY_STAT WHERE V_TIME BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), interval -1 day), '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')

/* DashboardMapper.getBmsData */ SELECT maxSoc, minSoc, bmsCapa FROM ( SELECT SUM(IF(V_KEY = "dodMax", V_VALUE, NULL)) AS maxSoc , SUM(IF(V_KEY = "dodMin", V_VALUE, NULL)) AS minSoc , IF(V_SITE_ID IS NOT NULL, V_SITE_ID, NULL) AS siteId FROM NST_PMS_SETTING ) AS P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT V_SITE_ID , SUM(D.D_PCS_CAPA) AS pcsCapa, SUM(D.D_PVI_CAPA) AS pviCapa, SUM(D.D_BMS_CAPA) AS bmsCapa FROM NST_DEVICE_INFO AS D GROUP BY V_SITE_ID ) AS D ON P.siteId = D.V_SITE_ID

/* DashboardMapper.getPmsSettingData */ SELECT maxSoc, minSoc, pcsCapa, pviCapa, bmsCapa, pvFollowRate, pviCnt FROM ( SELECT SUM(IF(V_KEY = "dodMax", V_VALUE, NULL)) AS maxSoc , SUM(IF(V_KEY = "dodMin", V_VALUE, NULL)) AS minSoc , SUM(IF(V_KEY = "pvFollowRate", V_VALUE, NULL)) AS pvFollowRate , IF(V_SITE_ID IS NOT NULL, V_SITE_ID, NULL) AS siteId FROM NST_PMS_SETTING ) AS P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT V_SITE_ID , SUM(D.D_PCS_CAPA) AS pcsCapa, SUM(D.D_PVI_CAPA) AS pviCapa , SUM(D.D_BMS_CAPA) AS bmsCapa , SUM(IF(V_GR_ID = '311', 1, 0)) AS pviCnt FROM NST_DEVICE_INFO AS D GROUP BY V_SITE_ID ) AS D ON P.siteId = D.V_SITE_ID

/* DashboardMapper.getTodayEventData */
SELECT E.V_START_TIME AS startTime , D.V_DEVICE_NM AS deviceNm , D.V_DEVICE_ID AS deviceId , E.V_EVENT_NM AS eventNm , E.V_EVENT_STATUS_CD AS eventStatusCd , CD2.V_CD_NM AS eventStatusNm , E.V_EVENT_LVL AS eventLvl , CD.V_CD_DESC AS eventLvlNm FROM NHT_EVENT E LEFT OUTER JOIN NST_DEVICE_INFO D ON D.V_SITE_ID = E.V_SITE_ID AND D.V_DEVICE_ID = E.V_DEVICE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN NST_CD_DETAIL CD ON CD.V_MASTER_CD = 'SM010' AND CD.V_DETAIL_CD = E.V_EVENT_LVL LEFT OUTER JOIN NST_CD_DETAIL CD2 ON CD2.V_MASTER_CD = 'SM049' AND CD2.V_DETAIL_CD = E.V_EVENT_STATUS_CD WHERE E.V_EVENT_STATUS_CD != 'ES003' AND LEFT(E.V_START_TIME, 8) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND (V_END_TIME IS NULL OR V_END_TIME = '') AND (E.V_DEVICE_ID, E.V_START_TIME, E.V_EVENT_NM) NOT IN ( SELECT V_DEVICE_ID, V_START_TIME, V_EVENT_NM FROM NHT_EVENT WHERE V_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND V_END_TIME != '' AND V_EVENT_STATUS_CD = 'ES003' )

/* DashboardMapper.getTodayEventDataCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NHT_EVENT E LEFT OUTER JOIN NST_DEVICE_INFO D ON D.V_SITE_ID = E.V_SITE_ID AND D.V_DEVICE_ID = E.V_DEVICE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN NST_CD_DETAIL CD ON CD.V_MASTER_CD = 'SM010' AND CD.V_DETAIL_CD = E.V_EVENT_LVL LEFT OUTER JOIN NST_CD_DETAIL CD2 ON CD2.V_MASTER_CD = 'SM049' AND CD2.V_DETAIL_CD = E.V_EVENT_STATUS_CD WHERE E.V_EVENT_STATUS_CD !='ES003' AND LEFT(E.V_START_TIME, 8) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND (V_END_TIME IS NULL OR V_END_TIME = '') AND (E.V_DEVICE_ID, E.V_START_TIME, E.V_EVENT_NM) NOT IN ( SELECT V_DEVICE_ID, V_START_TIME, V_EVENT_NM FROM NHT_EVENT WHERE V_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND V_END_TIME != '' AND V_EVENT_STATUS_CD = 'ES003' )
/* DashboardMapper.getSiteInfo */ SELECT V_GPS_X AS gpsX, V_GPS_Y AS gpsY FROM NST_SITE_INFO WHERE V_SITE_ID = ( SELECT V_SITE_ID FROM NST_PMS_SETTING LIMIT 1 )

/* DashboardMapper.getWeatherInfo */ SELECT IFNULL(D.V_ENG_DESCRIPTION, W.V_DESCRIPTION) AS weatherDesc, V_ICON AS icon , D_TEMP AS temp, D_HUMIDITY AS humidity, D_WIND_SPEED AS windSpeed, V_DIRE_ENG_DESC AS windDirection FROM NST_GLOBAL_WEATHER AS W LEFT JOIN NST_WEATHER_WIND_DIRECTION AS WD ON W.V_WIND_DIRE = WD.V_CARDINAL_DIRE LEFT JOIN NST_GLOBAL_WEATHER_DESC D ON W.V_ID = D.V_ID WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H')

/* DashboardMapper.getOperationPcsData */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH) AS monlyChargeKwh , SUM(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH) AS monlyDischaKwh FROM NRT_PCS_MONLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m') ) AS PM, ( SELECT SUM(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH) AS dailyChargeKwh , SUM(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH) AS dailyDischaKwh FROM NRT_PCS_DAILY_STAT WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) AS PD

/* DashboardMapper.getOperationPviData */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(D_PERIOD_GEN_KWH) AS monlyGenKwh FROM NRT_PVI_MONLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m') ) AS PM, ( SELECT SUM(D_PERIOD_GEN_KWH) AS dailyGenKwh FROM NRT_PVI_DAILY_STAT WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) AS PD

/* DashboardMapper.getSiteDetailInfo */ SELECT V_SITE_ID AS siteId, V_SITE_NM AS siteNm , V_MNGER_NM AS managerNm, V_ADDR AS address, V_PHONE_NO AS phoneNo FROM NST_SITE_INFO WHERE V_SITE_ID = ( SELECT V_SITE_ID FROM NST_SYSTEM_SETTING WHERE V_KEY = 'useLoginFailCntYN' )

/* DashboardMapper.getOperationChart */ SELECT time, SUM(IFNULL(periodGenKwh, 0)) AS periodGenKwh , SUM(IFNULL(periodChargeKwh, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh, SUM(IFNULL(periodDischaKwh, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh FROM ( ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_GEN_KWH, 0)) AS periodGenKwh, 0 AS periodChargeKwh, 0 AS periodDischaKwh FROM NRT_PVI_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) UNION ALL ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, 0 AS periodGenKwh, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh FROM NRT_PCS_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) ) AS DATA GROUP BY time

/* DashboardMapper.getPvsWeatherInfo */ SELECT D_PERIOD_HORI_SOLAR AS horiRadiation, D_PERIOD_SLOP_SOLAR AS inclRadiation , D_TEMP AS temp, D_HUMIDITY AS humidity FROM NRT_PVS_DAILY_STAT WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
